2 ¼ cups bleached cake flour,2 teaspoons baking powder,¾ teaspoon kosher salt,½ teaspoon ground nutmeg,¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon,⅔ cup sour cream, room temperature,½ cup granulated sugar,2 large egg yolks, room temperature,1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted and cooled slightly,1 tablespoon vegetable oil,1 teaspoon vanilla extract,vegetable oil as needed for frying,4 ½ cups powdered sugar,½ cup unsalted butter, melted,6 tablespoons hot water,1 ½ teaspoons light corn syrup,¼ teaspoon kosher salt,¼ teaspoon vanilla extract,,
